name: もちじゃんぷ
description:
Overview:
Mochijanpu is a highly challenging and unreasonable 3D action game.
If you are not good at action, aim to clear stage 1.

Controls:
WASD to move, space to jump, mouse to viewpoint.

Rules:
From the spawn point, you must reach the goal while avoiding obstacles that make the rice cakes inedible.
Choose the best solution from several different paths and use the bounces to reach the goal in order to become a tasty rice cake!

End content:
To become a tasty rice cake, it should be baked hot and cut into bite-size pieces.
Find something hot and something sharp hidden somewhere in the stage before you reach the goal.

Approximate difficulty level:
Stage 1: If you are not good at action, you may be able to clear the stage if you try hard enough.
Stage 2: Difficult if you are not good at action games
Stage 3: Difficult if you are not good at action
Stage 4: Difficult even if you are good at action
Hidden stage: Impossible


4 stages + 1 hidden stage. Please look for it.

・Offline only
・Keyboard and mouse only.
